website_summaries.verdict: Sure, this veggie-based weight loss cookbook’s recipes are healthy, but even dedicated carnivores will appreciate some of these low-calorie and high-flavor meals.
pros: 100 great-tasting vegetarian recipes containing 300-500 calories each
Examples include banana blueberry bread, black olive grilled cheese, and zucchini pizza bites
cons: Note this is for vegetarians, not vegans

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes - vegetarian NOT VEGAN and not 100% plant based.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this book, some very interesting recipes. To be clear - this book is vegetarian, not vegan. As a result, eggs are used in some dishes. So, it isn't completely plant based and they may need to re-examine the title. I knew what I was getting, so I wasn't disappointed in that. However, if you are vegan - not all recipes will work for you. But, there were some interesting and new takes and simple dishes and so far things have worked well that I tried. Again - know what you are getting. This is NOT a vegan cookbook. But, if you are trying to make a transition, it is a great book for your journey.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. J.

customer_reviews.title: Boring
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this book. I follow Jessica and Wendy's blog, and I was looking forward to receiving the book. I love to read food blogs, but I don't enjoy cooking from them. The recipes are boring and quite bland. I tried a few and always end up having to double, triple the amount of spice listed and add my own. I collect cookbooks, but this is something I can do without and you probably can too. The glowing reviews are confusing. The recipes are not innovative or inspiring. That tends to be the case with vegan/vegetarian books, maybe because the pickings are slim. I suggest taking a look at 22 Day nutrition by Marco Borges instead.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Henderson

customer_reviews.title: I love, love
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this book! It's a cookbook written with no agenda other than providing their community with recipes that are nutritious, simple and inexpensive. It's carefully crafted with wholesome recipes that can satisfy anyone! I can't express the level of gratitude I have for Jess & Wendy for writing this book.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Jade

customer_reviews.title: Great book!
customer_reviews.text: This book is helpful for people who need help in knowing where to get started. It has simple and uncomplicated recipes for people like me who want to eat healthier, but don't have a lot of time or money for the more trendy, expensive,and time consuming diets out there. Also, I like the fact that it is based on "plant-based" eating and not veganism. Thanks Jessica and Wendy for keeping it real and helping me to see that it is actually doable!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: Wendy and Jess are Awesome! I have followed them for years and I was so excited when they released a cookbook. The recipes are so delicious and flavorful, affordable too! I have cooked quite a bit using this book and it's definitely changing my palate for food in a great way!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Jones

customer_reviews.title: It’s tough to read the print
customer_reviews.text: The recipes in this book are beautifully done. The photography is great which for me helps me make the choice of what I will try. I’m only giving it three stars because as much as I think this is a beautiful book it’s very difficult to read. The font size is ridiculously small and to make it even worse it’s printed in a light color. The ingredients are listed in a larger font and darker color so I can see the ingredients and I’m just assuming how it goes together after my eyes blur by trying to read the print.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Recipes kids also like
customer_reviews.text: I've had this cookbook for 2 years now and it's still one of my go-to cookbooks. The recipes are easy to follow with simple ingredients that are found in regular grocery stores. The best thing is that my kids actually eat these meals! I hope the authors make a family version soon! In the meantime I double and triple the recipe amounts to make enough for my family and that works fine.
customer_reviews.author: MD mom

customer_reviews.title: This is my type of food.
customer_reviews.text: I love this book. The recipes are flavorful and easy to make. These are the kind of recipes that make you almost forget you're eating healthy which I believe is the only way to make eating healthy a lifestyle instead of a momentary diet. The spicy avocado toast is addictive! Making meals interesting and delicious is how I lost more than 75 pounds. I absolutely believe healthy eating can cure many ills. I'm glad to have found this book.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: innovative and useful cookbook
customer_reviews.text: This is such an innovative and useful cookbook! The eggplant gyro is a delicious, perfectly-sized meal. I'm looking forward to making the other creative dishes soon. It's so refreshing to find a collection with inspiring yet achievable recipes that contain flavorful, accessible ingredients. The nutritional expertise and planning resources are also exceptionally helpful.
customer_reviews.author: srspc

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: As proud meat eater, I like to incorporate more veggie/vegan options into my diet. I had high hopes for this book, but it was awful. No inspiring recipes and just stuff I can easily make on my own. I ended up giving it away to a vegan friend, who was also disappointed..lol. Save your money
customer_reviews.author: Moonie75

customer_reviews.title: Great Book to start to kick start your health food ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Book to kick start your health food journey! I have watched(YouTube) and listened(podcast) to these knowledgeable women for a little over a year now and they are a great source of all things healthy. The book is easy to follow with the most colorful and delectable food photos I have ever seen! Do yourself a favor and buy this book to jump start your journey to a healthier you. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: LeeNicole

customer_reviews.title: Healthy, Delicious, & Easy :)
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge fan of Wendy & Jess and so happy to see great work coming from fellow registered dietitians! The recipes I've tried so far from this book have been tasty and easy to make. The book also includes a primer on nutrition and meal planning that would be really helpful for someone just getting started cooking or transitioning to a healthier lifestyle. There are huge, gorgeous pictures throughout the book for almost every recipe. This book lives on my kitchen counter and I love flipping through for inspiration even when I'm not following a specific recipe.
customer_reviews.author: HG

customer_reviews.title: Just got my book and I'm so excited to try ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got my book and I'm so excited to try all the recipes. I'm currently trying to be a "flexitarian" -- I eat meat a few days a week and try to go meatless for the rest of thee week. I've been looking for so more meatless meals to make. Everything in the book looks mouthwatering. I can't wait to pick up a few more copies for my vegan/veggie friends.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Dee

customer_reviews.title: I give it an A
customer_reviews.text: Loved the variety. So some reason I thought it was going to be vegan but it's not. It's okay though. I can always sub out what I don't want. I haven't tried anything yet but the photos and description seems delicious. Can't wait
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: That there's healthy chooose to choose from
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this book first I like that it has pictures that I can choose from and the pictures of the food is very healthy for the body the delivery took a little longer then I expected but I'm excited to try the recipes in this book. Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Angela Baker-Snow

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to Cook Book Collection
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this cookbook. So many great recipes and simple too. The reboot is worth the price and also inspires you to try a few different ingredients. They have hit the nail on the head. I have no idea why they are not more popular.
customer_reviews.author: TiredMama

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't what I thought
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this book as a way to kick start my plant-based reboot. I was excited to receive the book but discovered that it wasn't what I expected. There's a lot of great information and recipes but it's not focused only on a plant-based lifestyle. The title makes it a little unclear (plant-powered vs. plant-based), but it's still a good book to have in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Clesha Staten

customer_reviews.title: This book is amazing for those who want to eat a healthy vegetarian ...
customer_reviews.text: I never wrote a review before, but I just had too. This book is amazing for those who want to eat a healthy vegetarian lifestyle, food that tastes amazing, food that is realistic, easy to find in grocery stores, and lose weight. These recipes are becoming lifestyle for me. The recipes are like 30 minutes or less to make. If your thinking about buying it....buy it!
customer_reviews.author: mayorb

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Beginner's Guide
customer_reviews.text: The journey to changing or incorporating more into your diet is daunting and one doesn't know where to start but look no further than this book. It guides you on the changes one can make for a more plant-based diet but it doesn't make it overwhelming; everything is doable and nothing requires expensive ingredients or anything outside of what one might already have in their kitchen. Worth the investment if starting on a new food journey.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Careful ... misleading title
customer_reviews.text: not vegan. the title "plant-powered" ... I thought that meant vegan. will give it as gift to a friend who is trying to go vegetarian.
customer_reviews.author: South Seeds

customer_reviews.title: Add this to your collection!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cookbook filled with great vegetarian recipes. You may need to double up on ingredients if you wish to yield more servings. Other than that I found this book to be very helpful and it has helped me transition to a new way of eating.
customer_reviews.author: TiaV

customer_reviews.title: Get the book!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely book. Followed the grocery list but I messed up on the blueberry banana cake. Will try it again. At the moment I've stocked my fridge with left overs and it really saves time. The book is informative and straight to the point
customer_reviews.author: SunGoddess

customer_reviews.title: Lots of good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome cookbook. The recipes are easy. I have made a couple of things already that turned out great.
customer_reviews.author: L. Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Good recipes
customer_reviews.text: Meals very easy to follow and don't take long to make. Tried the vegetable sandwich which was awesome and not heavily salty.
customer_reviews.author: Cocobrown4lyfe

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need!!!
customer_reviews.text: This book is everything I've been looking for!! Easy to follow and tells you everything you need to go plant based! Grocery list, pantry staples, and sooo many tasty recipes!! You need this book!
customer_reviews.author: Carla Vick

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: Great book great recipes really well put together and easy to start for clean eating
customer_reviews.author: Moroccan M.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this book!! And one for a friend.
customer_reviews.text: I love Jess & Wendy and I also love this book! The recipes are super easy and perfectly proportioned. I also like that a lot of the items are things that I have at home already. If you're on the fence about the purchase, try a few recipes from their blog. Also, follow them on Instagram.
customer_reviews.author: Sharde B

customer_reviews.title: Buy this book!
customer_reviews.text: SO helpful in leading you into a plant based month ! SUPER EASY recipes that my family enjoyed (even my 3 kids!)
customer_reviews.author: MsJB10

customer_reviews.title: YAAAS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This book is awesome and the recipes as easy af even after a long day at work I feel encouraged to cook instead of get take out. I hope next they will take on a vegan guide for those of us who want to transition from vegetarian to vegan after finishing this one.
customer_reviews.author: "qv

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS BOOK! If you're looking to jump start a healthy lifestyle with better eating habits, this is the cookbook for you. With all these delicious, easy to make recipes, you'll find it's very easy to eat clean and healthy. They even include a helpful meal prep guide to get you started and all sorts of other nutritional information. I'm going to buy this for my friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: I can't wait to try the recipes and I am so happy for their success
customer_reviews.text: I've followed these ladies since they were in school and on Youtube. I can't wait to try the recipes and I am so happy for their success.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This book is beautiful and inspiring
customer_reviews.text: This book is beautiful and inspiring! It has energized me to be my best and healthiest self! The pictures are vibrant and the recipes are approachable, making healthy cooking fun for us all.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka J.

customer_reviews.title: Hands Down one of my favorite cookbooks
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could chose an unlimited amount of stars! What a great book by a dynamic pair that has found a way to make healthy eating fun, hip and easy. I can't wait to dig in and implement these recipes into my eating routine. If you want a word of advice: Go get this this book!
customer_reviews.author: YG

customer_reviews.title: I have found your book an excellent source to create superbly creative and delicious good-for-the-body meals
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal book! The recipes were all practical and palatable. I have a busy schedule so managing a healthy eating regimen has been a challenge. Unlike other recipe books, I have found your book an excellent source to create superbly creative and delicious good-for-the-body meals. Some of my favorite recipes include the Chia banana pancakes and the homemade granola. It's so refreshing to have a cookbook that simplifies cooking, and where I don't have to buy a million ingredients to make a dish. I also love that there's practical tips provided for meal planning, stocking your pantry, and calculating your calorie needs. I have started to incorporate these recipes into my daily regimen!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Yussuf

customer_reviews.title: Time to RESET!
customer_reviews.text: I love this this cookbook. It's packed with tons of recipes that will keep your taste buds jumping for joy! The recipes are easy and the pictures are an added bonus. I also love how there's a detailed introduction (7 pages) and preparation component to the cookbook. Great cookbook if you need to reset your body!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GOOD IDEAS FOR MY WIFE AND MY SELF.FASIL DE ASER.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio G. Medina

customer_reviews.title: Great variety of tasty & easy recipes
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic book, with a nice variety easy-to-do recipes that don;t require exotic ingredients or kitchen gear. Perfect for busy foodies.
customer_reviews.author: Laure

customer_reviews.title: visuals are awesome
customer_reviews.text: Based off of the first recipe i must say i am enjoying the cookbook. As a long time youtube follower I enjoyed these two ladies. I look forward to a healthier lifestyle with their help. Thank Jess and Wendy
customer_reviews.author: Ladieblack

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this blog so I was excited to get the cook book, not disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Loves Books

customer_reviews.title: Very yummy recipes!
customer_reviews.text: I love this book! Very well thought out and a good introduction into eating more plant based meals. My family and I loved the black bean enchiladas and white bean basil spaghetti squash dish.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this book!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this book! I'm not vegetarian but I have been enjoying going without meat because of this book. I'm trying flavor combinations that I would have never considered before like sweet quinoa for breakfast! Who knew that would be amazing! One Pot Curry Risotto, it's everything! I've been cooking all my meals from this book for the last 3 weeks and everything has been super tasty and easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Book
customer_reviews.text: Great and Informative read. I loved the content,and the ease with which it was written.Thank you so very much Authors
customer_reviews.author: Sheri M.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this book. I haven't used it as a "reboot", but I did use it to increase the amount of meatless meals my family and I have a week and I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kamaren Walthour

customer_reviews.title: I love the Food Heaven Made Easy blog and their cookbook ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the Food Heaven Made Easy blog and their cookbook has quickly become my go-to. The recipes are flavorful, easy, and filling. I appreciate that many of the recipes included are vegan or easily adaptable. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Congrats on the cookbook!
customer_reviews.text: I've been following these young ladies for quite some time. They have a wonderful podcast and a YouTube Channel entitled the Food Heaven Show where they give great tips and advice about healthy eating. I'm so glad they have created a cook book and look forward to incorporating some of these recipes into practice. Most of them look easy to create and I am especially looking forward to creating some of these awesome snacks to help with my sweet tooth.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette

customer_reviews.title: Simple book with simple tasty healthy recipes
customer_reviews.text: Book has a lot of good information/tips and templates on getting organized and meal plan. Overall some easy meals that are very tasteful
customer_reviews.author: ash77

customer_reviews.title: Quick
customer_reviews.text: Love every recipe I've tried so far! Easy, quick and healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Divine! #leafygreencrew
customer_reviews.text: I have been following these girls for years! Their recipes are tasty and easy to follow. Definitely worth your while especially when transitioning to a plant-based diet/vegetarianism. My favorite aspect of this cookbook are the breakdowns for how to develop a healthy kitchen (which tools to have, spices, aromatics, vinegars, etc.) This information is very useful for beginners or people who need a bit more support on their wellness journey.
customer_reviews.author: Smh

customer_reviews.title: Helpful book for Healthy eating
customer_reviews.text: Very informative and helpful book. I will try recipes often.
customer_reviews.author: Momma D

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cookbook! Very thorough, so far I've done a whole five days in a row of their recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: A great book.
customer_reviews.text: A great book...I first checked it out at the library but it has so many good recipes I needed my own.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Luddington

customer_reviews.title: Great book! Very practical recipes and very well balanced
customer_reviews.text: Great book ! Very practical recipes and very well balanced ! Loved it !
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this book and life saving teachings and encouragement. I follow them on Instagram too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why would you send me a damaged book
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect but the book came damaged and with pages starting to lift.
customer_reviews.author: Hansenheathk

customer_reviews.title: Great Book!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great book! The recipes are really simple and to the point.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Harville

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved the ease of the recipes and the taste!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice book
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty book with easy recipes. I am unable to have dairy or soy so at first glance a lot of the recipes are not useful to me. I think I will gift the book.
customer_reviews.author: K. Summers

customer_reviews.title: This book is BEAUTIFUL and the recipes are so simple and delicious
customer_reviews.text: This book is BEAUTIFUL and the recipes are so simple and delicious! Do yourself a favor and get this book!
customer_reviews.author: Shayluv28

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great information and recipes. It's a well put together book. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Book Is Everything
customer_reviews.text: So thankful for these two wonderful women and their amazingly delicious cookbook.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great book!!
customer_reviews.text: Super excited to receive this book! I've been following Food Heaven Made Easy on youtube since they started, so I was happy that they were able to do this project. The recipes in this book are detailed and easy to follow with a grocery list as well as pantry must haves and I love how the serving size, calories, etc. is listed. The pictures are gorgeous and every dish looks delicious, YUM! I'm super proud of Jessica and Wendy and I love how they make healthy eating fun since it's somehow seen as being boring and weird. Can't wait to see what else they have in store for the future!
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: I love this book because its so easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: I love this book because its so easy to follow ! I was tired of feeling blah so I told myself in order for me to see change I have to change. These women really took the time to write this book and I am thoroughly enjoying it. I am not a vegetarian but after using this book, I am strongly considering it. I am proud of myself for challenging myself to do this because it has changed my outlook on being/becoming a vegetarian. Thanks ladies. I definitely would recommend this book for people who are trying to crossover into this lifestyle :) and anyone who is willing to try it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For all ages
customer_reviews.text: Love this book. I originally brought this book for myself but somehow my teenage daughter has took over. This book has shown her that as a young lady of color it's okay to have a diet consisting of something else that doesn't include meat. She has already made a couple of meals and loves the cauliflower and broccoli nuggets. Thank you for creating this book and sharing your story. When is part 2 coming out?
customer_reviews.author: Tabia Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: Supporting Black Women
customer_reviews.text: I love these girls that's why I purchased too support. But I'm leaning more towards vegan diets that also accommodate children. This is not that
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer
